trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when e-mail is sent using an <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"></xref> and cannot be delivered to all recipients.
trans-unit.target: Eccezione generata quando viene inviato tramite posta elettronica mediante un <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"> </xref> e non può essere recapitato a tutti i destinatari.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException.InnerExceptions%2A> property contains the exceptions received while attempting to send e-mail.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException.InnerExceptions%2A>proprietà contiene le eccezioni ricevute durante il tentativo di invio della posta elettronica.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException.InnerExceptions%2A>

trans-unit.source: The e-mail might have been successfully delivered to some of the recipients.
trans-unit.target: Messaggio di posta elettronica potrebbe sono stato recapitato per alcuni destinatari.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an empty instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza un'istanza vuota del <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"> </xref> classe con specificata <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The exception message.
trans-unit.target: Messaggio dell'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref> class from the specified instances of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> classes.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"> </xref> classe dalle istanze specificate del <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> e <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>classi.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: This constructor implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface for the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException> class.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore implementa l' <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>interfaccia per la <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException>classe.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance that contains the information required to serialize the new <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> istanza che contiene le informazioni necessarie per serializzare la nuova <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains the source of the serialized stream that is associated with the new <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>che contiene l'origine del flusso serializzato associato alla nuova <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"> </xref> istanza.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.String> and inner <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"> </xref> classe con gli oggetti <xref:System.String>e interna <xref:System.Exception>.</xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The exception message.
trans-unit.target: Messaggio dell'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: The inner exception.
trans-unit.target: L'eccezione interna.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.String> and array of type <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"> </xref> classe con l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.String>e matrice di tipo <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The exception message.
trans-unit.target: Messaggio dell'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: The array of recipients with delivery errors.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di destinatari, con gli errori di recapito.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance with the data that is needed to serialize the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Popola un <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> istanza con i dati necessari per serializzare il <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to be used.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> da utilizzare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> to be used.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>da utilizzare.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets one or more <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref>s that indicate the e-mail recipients with SMTP delivery errors.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene uno o più <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"> </xref>che indicano i destinatari di posta elettronica con errori di recapito SMTP.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref> that lists the recipients with delivery errors.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"> </xref> che sono elencati i destinatari con gli errori di recapito.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref> class from the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> instances.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"> </xref> classe dall'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> e <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>istanze.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: This constructor implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface for the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException> class.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore implementa l' <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>interfaccia per la <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException>classe.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that contains the information required to serialize the new <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> che contiene le informazioni necessarie per serializzare la nuova <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains the source of the serialized stream that is associated with the new <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>che contiene l'origine del flusso serializzato associato alla nuova <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"> </xref>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>
